name: LIDAR.EXE
description:
You are in a dark space, you can't see anything. You only have a lidar scanner with which you can scan the area. You wander through the corridors in the hope of finding a way out of this gloomy place.

This game is inspired by garry's mod addon LIDAR.

Controls: WASD - Move Shift - Run LMB - Scan RMB - Detailed scan Mouse scroll - Change radius E - Interact Follow to my twitter for updates
